messages.content: It's hard not to feel let down by Westminster politics right now.
For sixty five years, Labour and the Conservatives have been taking it in turns to run Britain. It doesn't matter whether the Government is blue or red – nothing ever really changes.
We can choose real change with the Liberal Democrats.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: With the Liberal Democrats, we can end decades of 'business as usual' in Westminster. We can clean up Westminster sleaze. We can get our economy moving again.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In many parts of Britain, it's a choice between the Liberal Democrats or Labour.

issues.economy: We can clean up Westminster sleaze. We can get our economy moving again.
issues.governance: With the Liberal Democrats, we can end decades of 'business as usual' in Westminster.

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS – Don't forget, in many parts of Britain it's a choice between the Lib Dems and Labour. The Conservatives are out of the race in these areas.
